title: Hand Made Signage
content:
Hi Im interested to know if anyone know where I could find a typeface that is similar in feel and personality to either of these typefaces. Anything close will do.  
Im interested in the company sign.  
 [http://www.theblackthorn.ca/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163108/http:/www.theblackthorn.ca/ "http://www.theblackthorn.ca/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163108/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_167.png) | 68.72 KB |

 [‹ help identifying this font, please! :)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163108/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49467 "Go to previous forum topic") [Time Magazine and International Herald Tribune Body Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163108/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49456 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jennaarmstrong

comments.content: What comes immediately to mind - as a good start for modification - is [Hawthorn](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163108/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/hawthorn/familytree.html). The related Romana Condensed would also have been good, but I don’t find any digital version.

Thanks thats helpful.  
Its somewhere between the both of them. The weight of the C in Hawthorn is wrong and the leg on the R isnt slanted the same way.  
Anyone with other suggestions would be helpful!  
Thanks so much Mike

Thanks thats helpful.  
Its somewhere between the both of them. The weight of the C in Hawthorn is wrong and the leg on the R isnt slanted the same way.  
Anyone with other suggestions would be helpful!  
Thanks so much Mike
